reviews.review: I went into this not really expecting what I got. Which isn't a bad thing. All I will say is, Thor's big entrance into Wakanda was one of the most thrilling scenes I've ever witnessed as a movie goer.
Best movie ever made so far. All of you complaining it would not be infinty war with out it
I absolutely loved it, I laughed and I cried. I can't wait for Avengers infinity war 2
Super power show off with a bad story stuffed in.

so first I would like to say I have never seen such an evil as thanos. The power of his will, was more powerful than any stone .. Thanos need of fulfilment was just the underlining for his success. This movie provided all types of emotions and their was maybe a lot of fluctuating going on in this film.. the story is about thanos, I had hope to explore more of his setup for exsistance but seems pretty standard for what came to pass. one flaw I did not enjoy.. was the secret of the soul stone location.. and how gamora came into knowledge of it.. was just over looked I wish they explored it in a movie.. but maybe well see it in captain marvel. the set up for the next film seems to be legit I cannot wait until we see what's in stored
Wonderful! Perfect! Everything we waited for!

I was so excited to finally see this movie. For the most part great movies leading up to this. No. I left unimpressed. I have 7 reasons as to why this was a bad movie.
1. Scarlet Witch/Vision
They were so genuinely bad in this movie it ruined it. Their love story almost became the plot. It was completely unnecessary. 
2. Hulk
They have ruined Hulk. He was a WHINEY LITTLE BITCH in this movie. He is supposed to be one of if not the most powerful Avenger. No he gets beat up once and he doesn't want to show himself.
3. Dumb Characters
The characters were so dumbed down the couldn't even think of the most basic and logical way to go about this. They easily could have gone back in time to stop Thanos from being born or just shoot him in the face in the beginning. But no they had to be more stupid than Captain America Civil War.
4. CGI
There is only one word to describe the CGI. AWFUL. I have never seen anything so horrible and visually unappealing.
5. Iron Man
He pissed me off so much in this movie it's not funny. I have always hated Iron Man but he was a control freak a real control freak in this one. 
6. Misleading Title
I will say in bluntly there was barely any time with the Avengers. It should  have been called Thanos and the Collection of the Infinity Stones with special appearances by the Avengers.
7. The Humor
There was inly one good line fron this horrible movie and that was "get lost Squidward" the other stuff was not funny and very childish. It was so stupid.

Wow, this was the perfect culmination of 10 years of movies. i have been a fan since the start, i have seen every marvel movie in theaters and i was blown away from start to finish. ps thor is the mvp..
By far the best superhero film ever made. Yes, even better than the Dark Knight! The movie is amazing from start to end. And the ending hurts.
